title: Mac Mini Fan Connector - No Pads - 820-3228-B
message:
Hi All,

Does anybody have schematic for the above computer?

Also can anybody recommend an alternative wire for running leads ? I can't find anything locally (Australia) and many Amazon sellers don't ship to Australia.

[URL unfurl="true"]https://store.rossmanngroup.com/jumper-wire-thick.html[/URL]

title: Mac Mini Fan Connector - No Pads - 820-3228-B
message:
I never saw Mac Mini schematics.

For trace rebuild, I bought 5 years ago 0.03mm on eBay.
Many times I needed tinier wire and I then removed from an iMac destroyed LCD cable.
Rebuild a trace under CD3215 requires something very tiny.

I recently bought 0.01mm and 0.02mm from Aliexpress; didn't arrived yet.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://es.aliexpress.com/item/32870142654.html?spm=a2g0s.9042311.0.0.274263c08NjVw4[/URL]
